tensordb.tensor_definition.Definition¶

pydantic model tensordb.tensor_definition.Definition¶

The definition allows to modify/extend the default behaviour of every method on the tensor_client, this is useful because you can create a pipeline that transform or read your data from other sources.

Show JSON schema

            "$ref": "#/definitions/MethodDescriptor"

         "title": "Substitute Method",
         "description": "\n        Replace the original method by this one, for example you can modify that every time you call append,\n        it will call the append method.\n        ",

               "title": "Parameters",

               "type": "object"

            "method_name"
         ]
      }

}

Config

  • extra: Extra = allow

Fields

  • data_transformation (Optional[List[tensordb.tensor_definition.MethodDescriptor]])

  • substitute_method (Optional[str])

field data_transformation: Optional[List[tensordb.tensor_definition.MethodDescriptor]] = None¶

Every element of the list must contain a MethodDescriptor object which specify the method that must be executed.

field substitute_method: Optional[str] = None¶

Replace the original method by this one, for example you can modify that every time you call append, it will call the append method.
